name: BlockSwitch
description:
Block switch is a simple game made in a short amount of time for a school project.

In it, you switch between controlling several blocks in a level and each block has its owns capabilities. You take advantage of these to get a block you are in control of on the finishing flag, which wins the level!

Controls:

WASD/Arrow Keys - Move/use tile

LMB - Switch control

R - Reset

There is currently only 5 levels, but I may update the game more more levels later if this game does well enough (I will also be fixing bugs and such)!
